Contact.title: Contact
Contact.intro: For general inquiries, partnerships, or support, please reach out:
Contact.note: We aim to respond within 2 business days.

Rules.title: Event Rules
Rules.intro: Please follow these guidelines when creating events:
Rules.rule2: Respect local regulations and community standards.
Rules.rule3: Do not submit spam or duplicate listings.
Rules.note: Violations may result in removal of events or account restrictions.
